data.prayer: Over 12.64 percent of the people of Buskerud are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Buskerud, Norway
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Buskerud, Norway to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Buskerud that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Buskerud to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Persian people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Persian people know you.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Buskerud, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Buskerud, Norway.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.section_summary:
the state of Buskerud, Norway has a population of 285,000.

We estimate Buskerud has 22,689 people who might know Jesus, 226,280 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,030 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Buskerud, Norway to the gospel today.
